sentences.sContent: a portfolio of work presented at interview
sentences.sCn: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.sContent: ...if you are going to be out of breath arriving at the interview on the second floor...
...it’s just that she submitted a job application yesterday and the company asked her in for an interview today...
...In an interview with TIME earlier this week...
...I was determined not to be beaten and returned to the interview trail...
...He is soon going to have an evaluation interview with his supervisor and the personnel director to discuss the work he has done in the past year...
...I think the best thing for you to do is do reply a writing to the advertisement.W: Can’t I arrange for an interview now...
...What she hadn’t known at the time of the interview was that the candidate’s “different” behavior was simply a cultural misunderstanding...

synos.tran: 采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试

phrases.pCn: 个人面谈；面谈调查；私人的会谈
对顾客需要的深入查询
结构化面试；结构式访谈
n. （对考生进行的）口头审查；非结构化面试；非结构性面谈

remMethod.val: inter(相互) ＋ view(看) → 相互观察 → 面试； 采访

words.tran: 会见者；面谈者；进行面试者

trans.tranOther: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc
to ask someone questions during an interview
